readable.title: 3219065971_702c4e8c34
readable.content: A boy and a person off-camera playing a card game . A small boy holding a hand of cards with Uno cards in the foreground . Boy sitting on the couch playing a game of Uno . The boy is playing UNO . Three UNO cards in reds and yellows in the foreground , with a young boy holding additional cards in the background .
